properties.areaDesc: Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 11 at 3:58PM EST until February 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 knots
tonight becoming southwest on Wednesday with gusts up to 30
knots and waves 3 to 6 feet. For the Gale Watch, north gales to
35 knots and waves 4 to 8 feet possible.

* WHERE...Holland to Manistee.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 PM EST
Wednesday. For the Gale Watch, from late Wednesday night
through Thursday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and largest waves will
occur Thursday morning into the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
